job_name: UI UX Designer 使用者介面與經驗設計
job_content:
As a UI UX Designer at RTL, you will...

1. identify and understand problems and gaps within our about-to-launch product, IDA, a data analytics platform.
2. independently come up with innovative and well-thought-out concepts that not only address user needs but also are intuitive to use.
3. turn innovative concepts into beautiful mockups and interactive prototypes. Preferably, you are highly experience in the wireframe tool - Figma.
4. work closely with developers to ensure your designs are implemented with excellent user experience.
5. work closely with designer as thought partner to create an innovative, intuitive, and consistent user experience and user interface for IDA.
6. along with designer, consolidate a consistent UI framework. Preferably, you are strong at UI and visual design and have experience in coming up with a Design System in Figma from scratch.
7. articulate clearly in English your design concepts and discuss closely with various team members. 
8. start work at 4am (winter time starting at 5am) in order to collaborate with team members in the US. Total work hour is 8 hours per day. You will work from home starting at 4am and work at the office from 8am.

身為RTL的使用者介面與經驗設計，您將會
1.找出並深入了解 RTL 的新產品IDA（數據分析平台）上的設計問題與使用者需求。
2.獨立思考並提出創新且經過深思熟慮的設計概念，這些概念不僅滿足用戶需求，而且是非常直覺性的。
3.將設計概念轉化為高保真模型(high fidelity mockups) 與可互動的原型 (interactive prototypes)。並且，你對線框圖工具Figma有豐富的經驗。
4.與開發人員緊密合作，確保你的設計被完整的實現並有出色的用戶體驗。
5.與我們的設計師緊密合作，為IDA創建創新，直觀，一致的用戶體驗和用戶界面。
6.與設計師合作，創建一致的UI框架。UI和視覺設計是你的強項，並且具有在Figma中提出設計系統 (Design System) 的經驗。
7.用英語清楚地表達你的設計概念，並與各個團隊成員進行密切討論。
8.早上4點開始工作（冬季時間從早上5點開始），以便與美國團隊成員進行協作。總工作時間為每天8小時。前半段在家上班，後半段進公司上班。
